items.title: This new Nintendo pro controller with Switch 2 wake-up support now starts from just $22 (Up to 15% off)
items.summary:
Gulikit’s new ES and ES Pro controllers for the Switch 2 just launched last month, and they’re already seeing their first price cuts at up to 15% off. The brand’s official storefront on Amazon is now offering its ES controller for $22.49 and the ES Pro controller for $25.49 Prime shipped (a $6 delivery fee will apply otherwise). That’s a 10% and 15% discount on the ES and ES Pro models, respectively, marking the lowest prices we’ve tracked for them to date. While not a huge markdown, these are still noteworthy deals that drop already-affordable controllers to new lows. You can get the standard ES controller in Grey, while the ES Pro is available in Black and White colors. Head below for more details.

more…

items.summary:
Jordan Novet / CNBC:
Atlassian agrees to acquire The Browser Company for $610M in cash, set to close by December; the startup, founded in 2019, develops the Dia browser, now in beta  —  Atlassian said it has agreed to acquire The Browser Company, a startup that offers a web browser with artificial intelligence features, for $610 million in cash.

items.title: The wait is finally over – Hollow Knight: Silksong releases everywhere this morning
items.summary:
This is it folks, the countdown has not only begun but it is about to finally, after nearly a decade of waiting, end – Hollow Knight: Sliksong will be live on all platforms this morning. Perhaps outside of whatever Nintendo eventually released for Switch 2, the most anticipated game of the year is about to go prime time and be available to download across just about any platform you could want it on.

items.title: Iran downgrades diplomatic ties with Australia after row over arson attacks

items.title: Aukey’s new 6-in-1 Qi2.2 MagFusion Ark is a modular wireless charging station with removable battery orbs
items.summary:
IFA 2025 announcements have started flowing, and Aukey is jumping in on the action alongside other brands like Anker to showcase its new modular charging solution called MagFusion Ark. This charging station stands out for its unique design, offering three Qi2.2 charging pads with spherical orbs that double as portable power banks – each equipped with its own Qi2.2-compatible pad. It’s a smart solution that covers both at-home and on-the-go charging needs, wrapped in a sleek design. Aukey plans to release the MagFusion Ark in Q1 2026, and you can get a closer look and more details below.

items.summary:

They used to be really good at falling down the stairs, but then the engineers got pretty good at stopping them from doing that, and now, courtesy of Anker’s Eufy labs, there’s a new MarsWalker ready for prime time in 2026 that can literally walk your robot vacuum up the stairs for you.

Today’s deal takes a huge chunk of this bundle’s price tag, shaving $199 off its usual going rate. It dropped to $399 earlier this year, and today’s deal lands it $49 below that to mark the lowest price we’ve tracked for it. This discounted price offers a great value for your money, considering the GoPro HERO 12 Black camera itself is going for $299 right now. Head below for more details.

items.title: LEGO’s 16-bit Super Mario World: Mario & Yoshi set with movable legs/tongue falls to new $104 low (Reg. $130)
items.summary:
Amazon is offering the best price to date on the LEGO Super Mario World: Mario & Yoshi set at $104 shipped. Normally, you’d be shelling out $130 for this set directly from LEGO, which famously offers very few discounts; however, at Amazon, it’s been seeing some cascading savings since the end of August, dropping to $119, then $117, and now lower-than-ever to $104. This is a 20% markdown that cuts $26 off the tag price, giving you the all-time lowest price we have tracked since it hit the market back in October.

more…

items.title: Save up to 55% on Segway’s Cube series power stations and solar panels starting from $170
items.summary:
Segway is offering some major savings on its Cube 1000 Portable Power Station down at $449.99 shipped, which is unavailable at Amazon, while the Cube 2000 Portable Power Station has dropped to $849.99 shipped, and is matching in price at Amazon right now. These two backup solutions usually go for $1,000 and $1,700 at full price, which we’ve mostly seen taken down to $500 and $900 with 2025 discounts. While these are not the lowest prices we’ve seen, they are the next-best rates that save you $550 and $850 off their MSRPs. Head below for more on these stations and the parallel solar panel discounts.

When I spend big on anything, I like to do everything I can to take good care of it. items.summary:
Addtam 15-foot 9-in-1 USB-C Surge Protector

Buy for $14 (Reg. $20)

What we love

If you have an outlet in your home that is super congested, relocating some outlets elsewhere can make all the difference. This discounted offering is ready and waiting with an extensive 15-foot power cord that allows you to easily get power from one part of a room to another. Once in place, you’ll have six AC outlets, dual USB-C, and one USB-A port at your disposal.

EUHOMY 5L Countertop Dishwasher

Buy for $242.50 (Reg. $270)

What we love

I’ve said it before, but I live in a home with a small kitchen that has no hope for a full-size dishwasher in it. This lead me to buying a countertop unit like this one, and honestly, it’s one of my favorite purchases several years later. Simply place it next to the sink, load your dishes, add detergent, and fill up the water reservoir, and boom, you’re done.
